name: Key Of Knight
description:
Key Of Knight - game about the knight who wants to resque her princess.

Current version: 0.6.6

----------------------------------------------

Main features are: 

1. Typing tutoring. You can increase your typing skills. 

2. Language teaching. You choose your language, and the keyboard, and can see the translations for a lot of words in different language. 

3. Fun action game. You are learning and make fun. Enjoy!

----------------------------------------------

Official group on facebook: https://www.facebook.com/KeyOfKnightHero/

Now it in development, there 20 levels. You can support or donate me.  I need money to buy or order the art for next levels.

Also, if you download it from Google Play, you will very help me to promote it. 

 Thank you!
